messages.message:
:white_check_mark: :large_green_circle: <!here> Ok! Fix for this (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1748546510861139) is merged. Turns out, your loyal neighborhood ~sysadmin~ ~curmudgeon~ ops guy forgot how shell command chains work and pushed a change that swallowed ALL FAILURES in any of the newly-instrumented make recipes. :lolcry:

Should be good now, and failing tests should, like... _fail the job_... the way it used to... til I got my hands on it... :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
Thanks for your patience while I figured out a forward fix!! :pray::skin-tone-3: :heart_hands::skin-tone-3:
